biotools.summary: This package provides methods to identify active transcriptional programs, including methods and classes to import or infer large scale co-regulatory network from transcriptomic data. The specificity of the encoded networks is to model TF cooperation. External regulation evidences (TFBS, ChIP,...) can be integrated to assess the inferred network and refine it if necessary.

bioschemas.name: CoRegNet
